Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos gave credit to the Mets for their remarkable turnaround and hot play, acknowledging that the Mets beat them in the series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies lost the NLDS to the Mets despite being six games ahead in the regular season standings.
Francisco Lindor hit a go-ahead grand slam in the sixth inning, sending the Mets to their first NLCS in nine years.
The Mets won the season series 9-8 against the Phillies, including the playoffs.
